quote_first: Hey, young man, what time is it? 'What?' I said, is it 5:30 yet? 'Er,
quote_last: .' Heavens, they'll be starving. But then that's a good thing. Let them.'
title: I Love Dollars
author: Zhu Wen

quote_last: now. The party's at six. By about ten past, the eleventh floor should be clearing. Arnold is a very popular partner; no one's going to miss his farewell speech if they can help it. Plus, at Carter Spink parties, the speeches always happen early on, so people can get back to work if they need to. And while everyone's listening I'll slip down to Arnold's office. It should work. It has to work. As I stare at my own bizarre reflection, I feel a grim resolve hardening inside me. He's not going to get away with everyone thinking he's a cheery, harmless old teddy bear. He's not going to get away with it.
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella
